document.full_text: baseball hall of famer nolan ryan will oversee all aspects of the texas rangers after adding the business side to his baseball responsibilities in an ownership shake-up announced by the club on friday.
document.title: ryan to run rangers business as well as baseball side
lines_and_colors: baseball hall of famer nolan ryan will oversee all aspects of the texas rangers after adding the business side to his baseball responsibilities in an ownership shake-up announced by the club on friday.
